findings.title: Missing zero address checks in approve(), transfer(), and transferFrom() functions
findings.description: The contract does not check for zero addresses in the approve(), transfer(), and transferFrom() functions, which can lead to unintentional transfers and approvals.

findings.title: TotalSupply function can be manipulated to display false information
findings.description: The totalSupply() function returns (25 million - Tokens held by zero address) and can be manipulated by an attacker by purchasing tokens and transferring them to a zero address, potentially displaying false information.

findings.title: Improper implementation of checks
findings.description: Transaction is initiated without any check, which can lead to math errors and poor coding style.
